column1: Met with rice & crawfish farmers in Midland to discuss relief options available through USDA. Every American family has been negatively impacted by coronavirus shutdowns including our farmers. My office is here to help you navigate the path to relief funding. We serve you. https://t.co/gv9hVAu5nU

Airports in #LA03 will receive over $21.2M through the CARES Act. This funding will help offset Coronavirus-related losses and ensure our local airports can maintain essential operations.  Read more here ⟶ https://t.co/pmuP3MJBq4

America’s energy producers are facing a generational crisis. My office is doing everything possible to protect the scores of thousands of Louisiana oil and gas jobs that are threatened by international market disruptions and COVID-19.  https://t.co/lkaBGwVkWL

Louisiana businesses experiencing a loss in revenue due to COVID-19 can now apply for low-interest disaster loans through the U.S. Small Business Administration. Apply online here: https://t.co/JFc5JwDo7U
@FroMAGAMot @realDonaldTrump Yes sir. It excludes treatments unrelated to COVID-19 ensuring Hyde protections remain intact and no funds go toward abortion.

The coronavirus response bill builds on @realDonaldTrump's commitment to expand testing limits new spending and health treatments to COVID-19 and provides U.S. families with much-needed economic stability. Overall this legislation is a win.  https://t.co/JkPyOWMup6

Everyday actions can help mitigate the spread of COVID-19.  - Stay home when sick - Disinfect frequently touched objects - Avoid touching your face - Wash your hands often for at least 20 seconds  For additional health tips and information visit https://t.co/OhOSHKzfda https://t.co/x7TADEZrTr
